headline: CrowdStrike Announces New Regional Clouds to Expand Secure Data Sovereignty
summary: AUSTIN, Texas, January 20, 2026--CrowdStrike (NASDAQ: CRWD) today advanced its Global Data Sovereignty initiative, including new in-country regional cloud deployments planned for Saudi Arabia, India, and the United Arab Emirates, with additional geographies to follow. These deployments empower organizations to adopt and consolidate on the CrowdStrike FalconÂ® platform locally while delivering a consistent Falcon experience across the globe.
